subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Software question . . .
author: Lisby
full_text:
Any program that works on a regular PC or Mac should work on a  
laptop, I think.

Try downloading a demo of something onto your laptop to see.

Ann


On Jan 13, 2008, at 6:27 PM, judy_in_hollywood wrote:

> I don't know where to find these. It probably would help me "bring- 
> out" the EVP's to be "clearer"and heard better. My next step.  
> Thanks =Judy=
